sentences.en: a preacher who claims that he can heal the sick
sentences.cn: 自称可以治病的传道士

sentences.en: Blunt injury to the spine will often heal with complete recovery.
sentences.cn: 脊柱的钝伤常可愈合,以致完全恢复.

sentences.en: He's going to be just fine. At his age he'll heal in no time.
sentences.cn: 他会好起来的。以他的年纪，他很快就会痊愈。

sentences.en: I bled the hands clean and the salt water will heal them.
sentences.cn: 我已经让手上的血流干净了,盐水会把它们治好的.

sentences.en: I bled them clean and the salt water will heal them.
sentences.cn: 它们出血出得很多,海水会把它们治好的.

sentences.en: I can heal a scratch from a fishbone in 24 hours.
sentences.cn: 我能在24小时内治愈鱼刺造成的轻伤.

sentences.en: It took three months for my arm to heal properly.
sentences.cn: 我的胳膊三个月之后才痊愈。

sentences.en: Minor cuts and grazes can usually be left uncovered to heal by themselves.
sentences.cn: 轻微的划伤和擦伤通常不用包扎就可以自愈。

sentences.en: Patients treated with morphine heal more quickly after surgery.
sentences.cn: 接受吗啡治疗的患者在手术后痊愈得比较快.

sentences.en: She has been so deeply hurt it may take forever for the wounds to heal.
sentences.cn: 她内心受伤太深，也许再也无法愈合。

sentences.en: The mouth of the sore will soon heal up.
The open part of the sore will soon heal up.
The rift between the two younger men never healed.
sentences.cn: 两个较年轻者之间的裂痕从未得以弥合。

sentences.en: The wounds may heal cleanly or they may ooze a clear liquid.
sentences.cn: 这些伤口可能会利索地愈合，也可能会分泌出一种透明的液体。

sentences.en: The years of misery had left scars that were slow to heal.
sentences.cn: 多少年来的痛苦所留下的创痕要慢慢地才能平复.

sentences.en: This wound will soon heal if yon keep it clean.
sentences.cn: 如果你保持伤口清洁,它很快就会痊愈.

sentences.en: Would you, therefore, that your physician heal the bodily evil?
sentences.cn: 因此, 你能叫你的医生只诊治你肉体上的病症 吗 ?

sentences.en: You'll mend. The X-rays show that your arm will heal all right.
sentences.cn: 你会康复的。X光照片显示你的胳膊能够较好地复原。

words.tran_cn: 医治者（尤指用宗教迷信方式给人治病的人）；治疗物；治病术士

trans.tran_en: to make someone who is ill become healthy again, especially by using natural powers or prayer

trans.tran_cn: 愈合， 痊愈， 恢复健康
trans.tran_en: if a wound or a broken bone heals or is healed, the flesh, skin, or bone grows back together and becomes healthy again

trans.tran_cn: 使愈合，治愈，使康复；调停，消除
trans.tran_en: if a wound or a broken bone heals or is healed, the flesh, skin, or bone grows back together and becomes healthy again
